author: rdonkin
msg: Echo note that Maven is the primary build tool

author: gnodet
msg: Add a bundle containing all the needed dependencies (is asm really required?)

author: rdonkin
msg: Move plugin definition to top level. This ensures that aggregate javadocs are available for assemble during packaging.

author: gnodet
msg: Small refactoring: change the activator to only use a single SynchronousBundleListener and use a thread to create the module contexts, change the parser to avoid class casts that are not needed and could cause exceptions if custom parsing change the type of the metadata (the spec does not really say anything about that), prepare the parser to have a multiple step initialization (which will be required to wait for dependencies)
